Interface BlockSet

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleBlockSet
public interface BlockSet

A set of KeyBlock's.

Author:
toad

Method Detail

get

KeyBlock get(Key key)
Get a block by its key.

Parameters:
key - The key of the block to get.
Returns:
A block, or null if there is no block with that key.

Add a block.

Parameters:

keys

Set keys()
Get the set of all the keys of all the blocks.

Returns:
A set of the keys of the blocks in the BlockSet. Not guaranteed to be kept up to date. Read only.
